nodes.bodyText: Should this be 6/30/20? Or it's not a date?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,41 @@
+# Decision Log for SDK V2 Metrics
+
+Note: The decision log process was implemented late in this project, so decisions earlier than 7/30/20 are not included 
+below.
+
+## Log Entry Template

+
+**Closed Decisions:**
+
+1. Question? Decision. Justification.
+
+**Open Decisions:**
+
+1. (Old/Reopened/New) Question?
+
+## 7/30/20

nodes.bodyText: +1 good catch! I guess I subconsciously really want 2020 to be over faster.
